import{createContext,useReducer}from"react";// Create the Candidature context
import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const CandidatureContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();// Reducer function to handle different actions
export const CandidatureReducer=(state,action)=>{switch(action.type){case"SET_CANDIDATURES":return{candidatures:action.payload};case"ADD_CANDIDATURE":return{candidatures:[action.payload,...state.candidatures]};case"DELETE_CANDIDATURE":return{candidatures:state.candidatures.filter(candidature=>candidature._id!==action.payload._id)};case"UPDATE_CANDIDATURE":return{candidatures:state.candidatures.map(candidature=>candidature._id===action.payload._id?action.payload:candidature)};default:return state;}};// Context provider component
export const CandidatureContextProvider=_ref=>{let{children}=_ref;const[state,dispatch]=useReducer(CandidatureReducer,{candidatures:[]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CandidatureContext.Provider,{value:{...state,dispatch},children:children});};
